code: import React,{Component}from'react';import rpc from'utils/rpc';import{connect}from'react-redux';import{showNotification}from'utils/notifications';import{setCall}from'store/phone/actions';import Navigation from'../../partials/navigation';import Button from'../../partials/button';import Info from'./info';import Controls from'./controls';class Contact extends Component{async onControlClick(type){const{contact}=this.props;if(type!=='call')return;try{await rpc.callServer('Phone-Call',contact.phone);this.props.setCall({type:'outgoing',phoneNumber:contact.phone});}catch(err){showNotification('error','Абонент тимчасово недоступний');}}render(){const{close,showEditor,toggleBlacklist,contact,blocked}=this.props;return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"contacts_contact"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Navigation,{close:{title:'Контакти',onClick:close},action:{title:'Редагувати',onClick:showEditor}}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"contacts_contact-header"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"avatar"},"".concat(contact.firstName.charAt(0)).concat(contact.lastName.charAt(0))),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",{className:"name"},"".concat(contact.firstName," ").concat(contact.lastName)),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Controls,{onClick:this.onControlClick.bind(this)})),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Info,{phone:contact.phone}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Button,{onClick:toggleBlacklist,color:"red"},blocked?'Розблокувати':'Заблокувати'));}}const mapDispatchToProps={setCall};export default connect(()=>({}),mapDispatchToProps)(Contact);
